item.title: Case Study of Enterprise Innovation in China: Xiaomi's Story
item.description: 1. Background of the company Xiaomi was founded in 2010 by the Chinese entrepreneur Lei Jun, who believes that “high-quality technology doesn’t need to cost a fortune” (mi.com). Xiaomi has been successfully targeting at the domestic market, and ranked the fourth in China’s smartphone market
